END ONLINE
activate debtor client
'N'=New Debtor Client
-- Button: FCI

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count (debb_debc_no),cast (sum (debb_actinvah) as decimal (18,2)) from :1/debb where debb_debc_no in ( select debc_no from :1/debc where debc_debh=:2 and debc_datdeleted is null)

Text.val: -- Fetch HUSR and ADMNO also in this task, because this task is called from
Task Prefix, where above selection on HUSR/ADMN is empty
//10-11-2003 JP SCR #4741 reset total amounts
update on total creditlimit
update on total financelimit
-- Delete only allowed if users have special permissions -- > "ODH003DL"

ExpSyntax.val: NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND NOT ({0,7}) AND (TDepth ()<10 OR InStr (Prog (),'ODH001DConnections')<>0) OR InStr (Prog (),'BINK process')<>0

all other cases
